edge: The film score of Kahaani is composed by Clinton Cerejo.
The soundtrack album of Kahaani, comprising six songs, is composed by Vishal–Shekhar.
The lyrics for some of the songs in the soundtrack album of Kahaani were written by Vishal Dadlani.
The lyrics for some of the songs in the soundtrack album of Kahaani were written by Anvita Dutt.
The lyrics for some of the songs in the soundtrack album of Kahaani were written by Sandeep Srivastava.
Several compositions by R. D. Burman, both in Hindi and Bengali, were used as background music in Kahaani.
The soundtrack album of Kahaani was released on the digital music platform Apple iTunes India since its inception from mid-2012.
